hero.description: Specialized in creating modern, intuitive, and high-performance web experiences.

about.title: About me
about.subtitle: Who am I?
about.para1: I am a web developer passionate about creating intuitive and aesthetic user interfaces. With solid expertise in React and other modern frontend technologies, I strive to create web experiences that combine performance, accessibility, and innovative design.
about.para2: My journey in web development began several years ago, and since then, I've had the opportunity to work on various projects ranging from showcase websites to complex web applications.
